entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
